title: PlayStation Store’s Mid-Year Deals promotion live June 18
description: Mark the (near) halfway point of 2025 by picking a new adventure (or several) from an assortment of titles discounted for a limited time on PlayStation Store! The Mid-Year Deals promotion collects third-person combat in the form of Black Myth: Wukong (save 20%), first-person thrills in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 (Vault Edition reduced […]
author: Zack Garvey
byline: Adam Michel Director, Game Services – Content, Sony Interactive Entertainment
excerpt: Save on select titles such as Black Myth: Wukong, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 for a limited time.
text: Mark the (near) halfway point of 2025 by picking a new adventure (or several) from an assortment of titles discounted for a limited time on PlayStation Store! The Mid-Year Deals promotion collects third-person combat in the form of Black Myth: Wukong (save 20%), first-person thrills in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 (Vault Edition reduced by 35%) and on the pitch action with EA Sports FC 25 (60% off the Ultimate Edition). These reductions, and many more, commence tomorrow, June 18 and are available until July 2*.   Browse a selection of games on offer below, then when the promotion goes live, head to PlayStation Store to discover the full range and your regional discount. Browse a selection of games on offer below, then when the promotion goes live, head to PlayStation Store to discover the full range and your regional discount. html:
Mark the (near) halfway point of 2025 by picking a new adventure (or several) from an assortment of titles discounted for a limited time on PlayStation Store! The Mid-Year Deals promotion collects third-person combat in the form of Black Myth: Wukong (save 20%), first-person thrills in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 (Vault Edition reduced by 35%) and on the pitch action with EA Sports FC 25 (60% off the Ultimate Edition). These reductions, and many more, commence tomorrow, June 18 and are available until July 2*.
